/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor of urban life. On the left side of the road, there's a bus stop, waiting for passengers to board. The image is taken from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky.
